You should also set the user which will be used for loading the candidate emails (leave blank for using the default Admin user). recruitment_home_title=Recruitement Application recruitment_home_description=The recruitment application will load automatically any candidate emails sent to a mailbox set in [[the preferences>>Settings]]. You can manually load the emails from [[the mail loading page>>Recruitment.Loading]]. The texts used in this application are editable from the [[Translations page>>RecruitmentCode.Translations]] recruitment_home_addcandidate_title=Add Candidate recruitment_home_addcandidate_description=To create a new candidate form, first choose a page name (usually first name/last name of the candidate) recruitment_home_addcandidate_candidate=Candidate: recruitment_home_addcandidate_candidatename=Candidate Name recruitment_home_addcandidate_add=Add recruitment_home_candidatelist_title=Candidate List recruitment_loading_title=Candidate eMail Loading recruitment_loading_description=This page will automatically load emails from your mailbox. recruitment_loading_nbmails=You have {0} mail(s) in the candidate mailbox. recruitment_loading_confirm=Confirm loading candidates recruitment_loading_confirm_withdelete=Confirm and delete loading candidates recruitment_loading_connect_failure=Failed to connect to mail server recruitment_loading_failure=Failed to load emails. Check the debug information recruitment_loading_success=Emails have been treated successfully.
